trans-unit.source: Contains properties and methods that when implemented by a <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter" />, allows processing of XML fragments.
trans-unit.target: 包含由 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter" /> 实现时允许处理 XML 片段的属性和方法。

trans-unit.source: This class defines the properties and methods related to the capability of an <xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter> to redirect part of its output (a 'fragment') to a different stream than the stream it was created with and to directly insert such a fragment captured by redirection back into the main stream of the same writer at a later point.
trans-unit.target: 此类定义与 <xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter> 的功能相关的属性和方法，以便将其输出部分（“片段”）重定向到不同于用于创建该类的流，并在晚些时候将由重定向捕获的片段直接插入到同一个编写器的主流中。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether this <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter" /> can process XML fragments.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示此 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter" /> 是否能够处理 XML 片段。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if this <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter" /> can process XML fragments; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果此 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter" /> 能够处理 XML 片段，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns `true` if the writer that implements this interface can generate and accept XML fragments.
trans-unit.target: 返回`true`如果实现此接口的编写器可以生成并接受 XML 片段。

trans-unit.source: Ends the processing of an XML fragment.
trans-unit.target: 结束 XML 片段的处理。

trans-unit.source: Stops redirecting output to the stream supplied by the matching `StartFragment` call.
trans-unit.target: 停止将输出重定向到由匹配的 `StartFragment` 调用所提供的流。

trans-unit.source: After this call, the XML writing output goes to the stream originally used by the writer before the `StartFragment` call.
trans-unit.target: 执行此调用后，写入输出的 XML 将转到调用 `StartFragment` 之前编写器原来使用的流。

trans-unit.source: The stream to write to.
trans-unit.target: 要写入的流。

trans-unit.source: If <see langword="true" />, any namespaces declared outside the fragment is declared again if used inside of it; if <see langword="false" /> the namespaces are not declared again.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="true" />，则在片段内部使用在片段外部声明的命名空间时，会在片段内部重新声明命名空间；如果为 <see langword="false" />，则不重新声明命名空间。

trans-unit.source: Starts the processing of an XML fragment.
trans-unit.target: 开始 XML 片段的处理。

trans-unit.source: Temporarily starts redirecting the writing of the XML output to the supplied stream until `EndFragment` is called.
trans-unit.target: 临时启动将 XML 输出的写入重定向到所提供的流，直到调用 `EndFragment`。

trans-unit.source: If `generateSelfContainedTextFragment` is `true`, then the redirected XML output is always text XML and is self-contained in terms of its namespace context.
trans-unit.target: 如果 `generateSelfContainedTextFragment` 为 `true`，则重定向的 XML 输出始终为文本 XML，并且对于其命名空间上下文是独立的。

trans-unit.source: `StartFragment`() calls cannot be nested.
trans-unit.target: 不能嵌套 `StartFragment`() 调用。

trans-unit.source: The buffer to write to.
trans-unit.target: 要写入的缓冲区。

trans-unit.source: The starting position from which to write in <c>buffer</c>.
trans-unit.target: <c>buffer</c> 中开始写入数据的位置。

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes to be written to the <c>buffer</c>.
trans-unit.target: 要写入 <c>buffer</c> 的字节数。

trans-unit.source: Writes an XML fragment to the underlying stream of the writer.
trans-unit.target: 将 XML 片段写入编写器的基础流。

trans-unit.source: Writes a fragment captured between `StartFragment` and `EndFragment` and calls back into the XmlDictionaryWriter's main stream.
trans-unit.target: 将捕获的片段写入到 `StartFragment` 和 `EndFragment` 之间并回调 XmlDictionaryWriter 的主流。

trans-unit.source: The fragment written is `count` bytes starting at the index `offset` from the supplied `buffer`.
trans-unit.target: 写入的片段为 `count` 字节，从提供的 `offset` 中的索引 `buffer` 处开始。

trans-unit.source: The behavior is undefined if the supplied fragment was not captured using this writer instance.
trans-unit.target: 如果提供的片段不是使用此编写器实例捕获的，则行为是不确定的。
